title: NBA Draft Round 1 Preview With Sam Vecenie. Plus: Looming CFB Conference Realignment.
description:
Russillo shares his thoughts on college football conference realignment (0:35) before talking with The Athletic's Sam Vecenie about the upcoming NBA draft and running through almost every first-round prospect (10:15). Finally Ryen answers some listener-submitted Life Advice questions (1:04:40).

Host: Ryen Russillo
Guest: Sam Vecenie
Producers: Kyle Crichton and Steve Ceruti
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
